txt.en: You have struck the training-dummy with the skill Shocking Words
Your trainer wants you to use your new skills to prove that you are ready to face the many dangers that exist in the world.

'Even in this refuge there are threats that we must confront. You will need to know how to defend yourself and push back these threats.

'If you wish to survive, you must learn skills from others, like myself. We can guide you through your training and help you to become stronger.

'Learn the skill <rgb=#00ff00>Shocking Words</rgb> from me and show me that my teaching has given you mastery by striking the training-dummy nearby.'

HINT:

Runekeepers require <rgb=#ff0000>Battle Attunement</rgb> to use offensive skills, and <rgb=#00ff00>Healing Attunement</rgb> to cast healing spells.  <rgb=#ffff00>Attunement</rgb> is <rgb=#ff0000>raised</rgb> or <rgb=#00ff00>lowered</rgb> through the use of similar skills.  Offensive Skills typically have <rgb=#ff0000>Red</rgb> backgrounds, and Healing skills typically have <rgb=#00ff00>Green</rgb> backgrounds.  Use your offensive skills to raise your <rgb=#ff0000>Battle Attunement</rgb> to three and then use your <rgb=#00ff00>Shocking Words</rgb> skill.

You should speak with the trainer again and learn the skill <rgb=#FF0000>Shocking Words</rgb>. Use your new skill on the training-dummy nearby. 

<rgb=#00ff00>NOTE: Use the trainer and select Train Rune-keeper Skills to open the skill selection panel. Left-click on a skill to highlight it and then left-click the Train button at the bottom of the skill selection panel -- or double-click the skill -- and you will successfully purchase the skill.</rgb>

HINT:

Runekeepers require <rgb=#ff0000>Battle Attunement</rgb> to use offensive skills, and <rgb=#00ff00>Healing Attunement</rgb> to cast healing spells.  <rgb=#ffff00>Attunement</rgb> is <rgb=#ff0000>raised</rgb> or <rgb=#00ff00>lowered</rgb> through the use of similar skills.  Offensive Skills typically have <rgb=#ff0000>Red</rgb> backgrounds, and Healing skills typically have <rgb=#00ff00>Green</rgb> backgrounds.  Use your offensive skills to raise your <rgb=#ff0000>Battle Attunement</rgb> to three and then use your <rgb=#00ff00>Shocking Words</rgb> skill.
'Yes, I sensed that you were well-prepared, [placeholder]. \n\n'Speak with Bolli and tell him that I believe you are ready.'
The Rune-keeper Trainer is in Frerin's Court.\n\nNow that you have successfully used your newly-learned skill return to your trainer and tell him of your success.
Tell Bolli you are for battle.

'Strike the training-dummy with your new skill and return to me. We must make certain that you are prepared to stand against the dangers of Middle-earth.'

HINT:

Runekeepers require <rgb=#ff0000>Battle Attunement</rgb> to use offensive skills, and <rgb=#00ff00>Healing Attunement</rgb> to cast healing spells.  <rgb=#ffff00>Attunement</rgb> is <rgb=#ff0000>raised</rgb> or <rgb=#00ff00>lowered</rgb> through the use of similar skills.  Offensive Skills typically have <rgb=#ff0000>Red</rgb> backgrounds, and Healing skills typically have <rgb=#00ff00>Green</rgb> backgrounds.  Use your offensive skills to raise your <rgb=#ff0000>Battle Attunement</rgb> to three and then use your <rgb=#00ff00>Shocking Words</rgb> skill.
'Yes, I knew that you were well prepared [placeholder]. \n\n'Speak with Bolli and tell him that I believe you are ready.'
'I will teach you more when you are ready to learn, for the moment you should speak with Bolli.'
Use the skill <rgb=#FF0000>Shocking Words</rgb> on the training-dummy
Talk to the Rune-keeperTrainer in Frerin's Court
